parameters.name: IpamId
parameters.description: The instance ID of the IPAM.

parameters.name: IpamScopeIds
parameters.description: The instance IDs of the IPAM scopes.

parameters.name: IpamScopeName
parameters.description:
The name of the IPAM scope.

The name must be 1 to 128 characters in length and cannot start with `http://` or `https://`.

parameters.name: IpamScopeType
parameters.description:
The type of the IPAM scope. Valid values:

- **public**: the public scope.

- **private**: the private scope.

parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description: The maximum number of entries to return on each page. Valid values: 1 to 100. Default value: 10.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description:
The token that is used for the next query. Valid values:

- You do not need to specify this parameter for the first query.

- For a subsequent query, set this parameter to the NextToken value returned from the last query.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region where the IPAM instance is deployed. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~36063~~) operation to obtain the region ID.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group to which the IPAM scope belongs.
